author: Phil Vickery
method: For the salad, place all the salad ingredients into a bowl and mix well. For the dressing, place the oil and vinegar into a bowl, season with salt and freshly ground black pepper and mix well. To serve, pour the dressing over the salad, stir well and place into serving bowls.
ingredients: 1 cos lettuce, roughly chopped,  2 ripe tomatoes, chopped,  100g/3½oz tinned tuna, drained,  2 spring onions, chopped,  handful fresh parsley, chopped,  ½ mozzarella ball, cut into cubes,  110g/4oz spaghetti, cooked according to packet instructions, drained and allowed to cool ,  1 tbsp olive oil,  2 tsp balsamic vinegar,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
